snippet: The Yankees-Pirates game on Friday night was washed away, so now the teams will play an old-fashioned, single-admission doubleheader Sunday afternoon at Yankee Stadium.
abstract: Rainout will force New York Yankees and Pittsburgh Pirates to play an old-fashioned, single-admission doubleheader at Yankee Stadium; once a popular staple of baseball summers in New York, single-admission doubleheaders have declined in recent decades with teams preferring to maximize gates and revenue with two-admission, day-night doubleheaders.

byline.original: By KEN PLUTNICKI and RICHARD SANDOMIR

lead_paragraph: The Yankees-Pirates game on Friday night was washed away, so now the teams will play an old-fashioned, single-admission doubleheader Sunday afternoon at Yankee Stadium.

headline.main: Rainout Puts Yanks in Old-Time 2-Game Set
headline.print_headline: Rainout Puts Yanks in Old-Time 2-Game Set
